page.title: 15WALLINGWELLS AUTHORESS
page.content: On Wednesday the 26th of June we visited{Wallingwells House.}Mrs{ {Slingby_Smith}lives in there.}The house is about {400 years old.}She writes books. One has just been published.It is called{George Memoirs {of a Gentlemans Gentleman.}It is based on Mrs {Slingby_Smith's}father in the way he told his life to her.The books have been published in 36 countries. Mrs{Slingsby_Smith }has written childrens books.She told us that the books are a bit like the{Wind in the {willows}but different characters. There is{Monty Mole}and{Magpie.}The title of the book is{Tales of {Tabworth.}She got the name from where she used to live in{Babworth.}Mrs Slingsby_Smith is the eldest of her fathers daughters.
